text: @NHSEngland @piersmorgan @GoodSamApp @NikkiKF WHO and Global Health partners urging for Public health and safety,and for all Healthcare professionals,and those on the frontlines of #COVID19,for their mental and physical health,and wellbeing, to avoid Alcohol consumption-Show your support-Thank you!
